page.title: 01ENHAM INDUSTRIES
page.content: The {INDUSTRY}is in Enham Alamein where disabled and abled people seek { {EMPLOYMENT}We went there and were taken round by Mrs. Beard. We saw that some of the machines are made especially for disabled people. Paula Lankshire's dad is one of the workers but he is not disabled. Enham Industries is very big. It has a garden centre and a water garden with a water-fall with lots of fish. They do lots of {ART AND CRAFTS} like candle making. Enham Industries first started in 1918 when four wealthy people purchased the whole of Enham Village estate so they could make homes and provide work for the people injured in the first World War. Enham{ {INDUSTRY} is competing with other major firms for work. Although a number of the workers are disabled they still have to do first class work
